thread.section_title: Burgers' Smokehouse Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Burgers' Smokehouse | smokehouse.com
thread.title: Matthew Kizzie
thread.title_full: Burgers' Smokehouse reviewed by Matthew Kizzie

author: Matthew Kizzie
title: Matthew Kizzie
text: Burgers' Smokehouse has a great variety of foods and the smoked meats are really good. I've used them to send gifts to my mother and brother in addition to ordering for myself. Delivery is very quick and the packaging is perfect, having your meats arrive in a cooler with dry ice which keeps your chosen meats cold and not arriving in a spoiled condition.
